settings.head: Our Story
settings.desc:
In the midst of the Covid-19 pandemic, a dynamic duo – a husband and wife – found themselves facing a common challenge: the emergence of acne and hyperpigmentation caused by the extended use of masks.

We were both raised as children of Middle Eastern immigrants and were fortunate to be exposed to a range of traditional remedies. Fond memories include the application of South Eastern Asian extracts like turmeric for managing bruises and dark marks. These age-old practices left a lasting impression on us.

Determined to find a solution, we embarked on a journey, delving into the realms of skincare. Exploring various avenues, we experimented with natural remedies, clean formulations, and dermatologist-endorsed products, each offering its own unique set of advantages.

It was this exploration that sparked a groundbreaking idea within us. Why not fuse the best of all worlds? Thus, our vision took shape – a holistic approach to skincare that harmoniously melds the power of natural root extracts with the efficacy of scientifically-proven active ingredients, all under the guidance of seasoned dermatologists.

This ethos of duality threads through every facet of our product line. We craft skincare solutions that unite the wisdom of nature and the precision of science, offering you a truly balanced and transformative experience.

settings.head: [ZEH-LAH-Zeh] Abbreviation
settings.sub_head:
Zelaze is an abbreviation for the ancient phrase, ZE LEUMAT ZE, which connotes duality or the bringing together of different worlds.

Our formulations bring together plant-based natural ingredients and innovative scientific actives to formulate natural skincare products that actually work

settings.head: Dermatologist Formulated For:
settings.sub_head: All skin types + sensitive and acne prone akin
